titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the requirement for computation of tax on the aggregate income of husband and wife and to repeal joint and several liability of husband and wife.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/11/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to joint husband and wife income tax returns to repeal provisions providing for: (1) aggregate determination of income and joint and several liability; and (2) spousal relief of liability.
